channel.title: 317 PI? Add Specials to specific weapons?
channel.description: well my server has alot of weapons without there specs? vls dragon claws statius hammer how would i add them? if i could get some help or a tut? please

item.title: 317 PI? Add Specials to specific weapons?
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Add this into animation.java [client sided]

if(j == 6000){ int file = 1919; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {75,62,93,82,57,71,66,61,92,73,65,89,70,81,67,84,59,63,99,78,69,96,74,79,90,94,58}; anims[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; anims[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ anims[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; anims[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; anims[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 0; } }

And this for the vesta longsword

if(j == 6502) { int file = 2571; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {46,63,144,57,97,138,78,157,93, 66,42,114,114,132,149,140,109,46,0}; int[] delays = {3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,0}; anims[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; anims[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; anims[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++) { anims[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; anims[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; anims[j].anIntArray355[i2] = delays[i2]; } }

Hope it helped.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI? Add Specials to specific weapons?
item.dc:creator: @lpxd lpxd
item.description:
@lpxd wrote:

Try following I Vain I’s tut on adding basic project insanity features.
You might learn more about coding if you just looked at the code for other items with special attack, and then used those to code other special attacks.
Dragon claws are a bit hard to code with all 4 hits, so i would look for a tutorial or rip it from another server.

Read full topic

@ ItemAssistant…

case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 5680: case 5698: case 1305: // dragon long case 11694: case 11698: case 11700: case 11730: case 11696: case 13899: // vesta longsword case 14484: // dragon claws c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586); break;

Maybe this helped…
